name: "Quotables"
tagline: Random quote generator from various renowned personalities.
body:
### Welcome to Quotables.
Random quote generator from various renowned personalities.  When button is pressed, it plays a song and displays next quote.  Also next quote can be displayed by shaking the iPhone.

### Authors and Contributors
@knaseem

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? (https://github.com/knaseem) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
